trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand> event when a button within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> row field is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controlar gera o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand>evento quando um botão dentro de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>, ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>campo de linha é clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que você forneça um manipulador de eventos que executa uma rotina personalizada sempre que esse evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control also raises other specialized events when certain buttons are clicked (buttons with the `CommandName` property set to "Delete", "Insert", "Page", or "Update").
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controle também gera outros eventos especializados quando determinados botões são clicados (botões com o `CommandName` propriedade definida como "Excluir", "Insert", "Página" ou "Atualização").</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: When using one of these buttons, you should consider using one of the specialized events provided by the control (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleted> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>).
trans-unit.target: Ao usar um desses botões, considere usar um dos eventos especializados fornecidos pelo controle (como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleted>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleted>

trans-unit.source: A DetailsViewCommandEventArgs object is passed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto DetailsViewCommandEventArgs é passado para o manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: If the button that raised the event has a command name or command argument value, you can use the DetailsViewCommandEventArgs object to determine these values.
trans-unit.target: Se o botão que disparou o evento tem um nome de comando ou o valor do argumento de comando, você pode usar o objeto DetailsViewCommandEventArgs para determinar esses valores.

trans-unit.source: To determine the command name and command argument of the button clicked, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o nome do comando e o argumento de comando do botão clicado, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>Propriedades, respectivamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control that raised the event by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode acessar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controle que disparou o evento usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the DetailsViewCommandEventArgs class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância da classe DetailsViewCommandEventArgs, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para inicializar uma nova instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra os valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> contained in the `originalArgs` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object contained in the `originalArgs` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>|The object contained in the `commandSource` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>| O valor da propriedade <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>contido no `originalArgs` parâmetro. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>| O valor da propriedade do objeto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>contido em <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>o `originalArgs` parâmetro. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>| O objeto contido no `commandSource` parâmetro. | > [!NOTE] > Este construtor é usado principalmente por desenvolvedores de controle quando gerar eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: A origem do comando.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"></xref> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"> </xref> que contém dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a origem do comando.

trans-unit.source: Use the CommandSource property to access the properties of the object that represents the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade CommandSource para acessar as propriedades do objeto que representa a fonte do comando.

trans-unit.source: In some cases, this will be the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control itself, and in other cases it will be the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Em alguns casos, esse será o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>próprio controle e, em outros casos, será o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>controle foi clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> class that represents the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> classe que representa a fonte do comando.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control has handled the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o controle tratou o evento.

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true` in the event handler to specify that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control should not handle the event because you are handling it in your code.
trans-unit.target: Defina essa propriedade como `true` no manipulador de eventos para especificar que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controle não deve manipular o evento porque você lidar com isso em seu código.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data-bound event code was skipped or has finished running; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o código de associação de dados de evento foi ignorado ou concluiu a execução; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
